title: Enhancing Nursing Practice Competencies: Social Constructivist Instructional Design in Mobile Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can design collaborative learning scenarios utilizing mobile devices (BYOD).

Learners can analyze six supportive elements based on social constructivist principles: social interaction, teacher roles, technology integration, physical environment, learning tasks, and modes of representation.
Learners can develop mobile-based instructional design models applicable to real workplace environments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
